commands.name: az storage blob tag list
commands.summary: Get tags on a blob or specific blob version, or snapshot.
commands.syntax:
az storage blob tag list [--account-key]
                         [--account-name]
                         [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                         [--blob-endpoint]
                         [--blob-url]
                         [--connection-string]
                         [--container-name]
                         [--name]
                         [--sas-token]
                         [--snapshot]
                         [--tags-condition]
                         [--timeout]
                         [--version-id]

commands.name: az storage blob tag set
commands.summary: Set tags on a blob or specific blob version, but not snapshot.
commands.syntax:
az storage blob tag set --tags
                        [--account-key]
                        [--account-name]
                        [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                        [--blob-endpoint]
                        [--blob-url]
                        [--connection-string]
                        [--container-name]
                        [--name]
                        [--sas-token]
                        [--tags-condition]
                        [--timeout]
                        [--version-id]
